Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value:
This Workflow syncs products from Salesforce to Shopify.
It retrieves product data from Salesforce and checks if each product exists in the Key Value Group using the ProductCode as the key.
If Missing, it maps the data to Shopify format, creates the product in Shopify, logs the result, and stores the Shopify Response Code.
If Found, a message is displayed via the Formatter Node.

Nodes.Name: VariableBar
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are setting the Group for the Key-Value

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we display a message if the Product Code has been found in the Key Values

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Value: Product Code: "{ProductCode}" has already been processed.

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for successful records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the ProductCode as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Shopify Response Code as the Value.

Nodes.Name: Salesforce
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are querying the list of Products from Salesforce limited to three

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request" type="xs:string" />
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request
Properties.Value:
<Request>SELECT
	Id,
	Name,
	ProductCode,
	Description,
	IsActive,
	CreatedDate,
	CreatedById,
	LastModifiedDate,
	LastModifiedById,
	SystemModstamp,
	Family,
	ExternalDataSourceId,
	ExternalId,
	DisplayUrl,
	QuantityUnitOfMeasure,
	IsDeleted,
	IsArchived,
	LastViewedDate,
	LastReferencedDate,
	StockKeepingUnit
FROM Product2 LIMIT 3</Request>

Nodes.Name: ForEach
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we split the Product List from Salesforce into individual product records

Nodes.Name: GetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we check to see if the Product has been processed before by checking if a Key Value record has already been logged for this Product Code.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we map the Product data retrieved from Salesforce to the Shopify format before creating the product record in Shopify.
Both XML and JSON document types are utilized in this step.

Nodes.Name: ShopifyRest
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating the Product in Shopify

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are checking if the Product was created successfully in Shopify by the value of the Response Code.

A successful Shopify Response looks as follows:
{

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for error records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the Product Code as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Shopify Response Code as the Value.

Name: Salesforce to Shopify Products
Description: This Workflow syncs Products from Salesforce to Shopify by checking each product against a Key Value Group using the ProductCode. If not found, it maps and creates the product in Shopify, logs the result, and stores the Response Code; otherwise, it displays a message.
